name: L'Archipel des Ermites
description:
I'm digging from the digital crates some of the first games I made with RPG Maker ! I made this one in 2007 (more than 10 years ago !) and I'm attached to it because it was the first real project I made.

It's a small RPG that should take about 10 minutes to complete. The combats are not really interesting but I had fun making this game, I even made a sequel !

Enjoy !

Sorry for the non french speaker ^^
